verses.verse: But in the last <WH319> days <WH3117> it shall come to pass <WH2022>, that the mountain of the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> shall be established <WH3559> in the top <WH7218> of the mountains <WH2022>, and it shall be exalted <WH5375> above the hills <WH1389>; and people <WH5971> shall flow unto it <WH5102>.

And many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> shall come <WH1980>, and say <WH559>, Come <WH3212>, and let us go up <WH5927> to the mountain <WH2022> of the Lord <WH3068>, and to the house <WH1004> of the God <WH430> of Jacob <WH3290>; and he will teach <WH3384> us of his ways <WH1870>, and we will walk <WH3212> in his paths <WH734>: for the law <WH8451> shall go forth <WH3318> of Zion <WH6726>, and the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> from Jerusalem <WH3389>.

And he shall judge <WH8199> among many <WH7227> people <WH5971>, and rebuke <WH3198> strong <WH6099> nations <WH1471> afar off <WH7350>; and they shall beat <WH3807> their swords <WH2719> into plowshares <WH855>, and their spears <WH2595> into pruninghooks <WH4211>: nation <WH1471> shall not lift up <WH5375> a sword <WH2719> against nation <WH1471>, neither shall they learn <WH3925> war any more <WH4421>.

But they shall sit <WH3427> every man <WH376> under his vine <WH1612> and under his fig tree <WH8384>; and none shall make them afraid <WH2729>: for the mouth <WH6310> of the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> has spoken it <WH1696>.

For all people <WH5971> will walk <WH3212> every one <WH376> in the name <WH8034> of his god <WH430>, and we will walk <WH3212> in the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>.

In that day <WH3117>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068>, will I assemble <WH622> her that limps <WH6760>, and I will gather <WH6908> her that is driven out <WH5080>, and her that I have afflicted <WH7489>;

And I will make <WH7760> her that limped <WH6760> a remnant <WH7611>, and her that was cast far off <WH1972> a strong <WH6099> nation <WH1471>: and the Lord <WH3068> shall reign <WH4427> over them in mountain <WH2022> Zion <WH6726> from henceforth <WH5704>, even for ever <WH5769>.

And you <WH4026>, O tower of the flock <WH5739>, the strong hold <WH6076> of the daughter <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726>, unto you shall it come <WH857>, even the first <WH7223> dominion <WH4475>; the kingdom <WH4467> shall come <WH935> to the daughter <WH1323> of Jerusalem <WH3389>.

Now why do you cry <WH7321> out aloud <WH7452>? is there no king <WH4428> in you <WH3289>? is your counselor perished <WH6>? for pangs <WH2427> have taken <WH2388> you as a woman in hardship <WH3205>.

Be in pain <WH2342>, and labor to bring forth <WH1518>, O daughter <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726>, like a woman in hardship <WH3205>: for now shall you go forth <WH3318> out of the city <WH7151>, and you shall live <WH7931> in the field <WH7704>, and you shall go <WH935> even to Babylon <WH894>; there shall you be delivered <WH5337>; there the Lord <WH3068> shall redeem <WH1350> you from the hand <WH3709> of your enemies <WH341>.
Now also many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> are gathered <WH622> against you <WH559>, that say, Let her be defiled <WH2610>, and let our eye <WH5869> look <WH2372> upon Zion <WH6726>.

But they know <WH3045> not the thoughts <WH4284> of the Lord <WH3068>, neither understand <WH995> they his counsel <WH6098>: for he shall gather <WH6908> them as the sheaves <WH5995> into the floor <WH1637>.

Arise <WH6965> and thresh <WH1758>, O daughter <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726>: for I will make <WH7760> your horn <WH7161> iron <WH1270>, and I will make <WH7760> your hoofs <WH6541> brass <WH5154>: and you shall beat in pieces <WH1854> many <WH7227> people <WH5971>: and I will consecrate <WH2763> their gain <WH1215> unto the Lord <WH3068>, and their substance <WH2428> unto the Lord <WH113> of the whole earth <WH776>.
